name: Psi Project 2
description:
Psi Project 2 - is a continuation of the 2D shooter with elements of horror.
The event takes place the day before the original game. We are given control of a mercenary named Hugh. Its main goal is to clean up the complex from the infected with an unknown disease monsters. Be careful, a huge number of enemies will not let you get bored, clean up the objects one by one. You have no margin for error. Search for weapons and ammunition, pass the levels and eventually you will learn who is Hugh and how he's in this mess.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Hardcore gameplay.
  • Oldschool graphics.
  • A large number of various levels.
  • Unforgettable adventures.
